lead_paragraph: Ronald G. Buell, 49, admitted to providing restricted information to an investigator for criminal defense lawyers.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Sergeant Admits Using Police Databases for Money
headline.main: Retired Police Sergeant Pleads Guilty to Tapping Into Confidential Databases for Money

snippet: Ronald G. Buell, 49, admitted to providing restricted information to an investigator for criminal defense lawyers.
abstract: New York City Police Officer Ronald G Buell pleads guilty to conspiracy; admits he illegally accessed restricted FBI databases in order to sell information to former officer and private criminal defense investigator Joseph P Dwyer; could face up to five years in prison.
